camera_and_perspective.view_angle: Cinematic Aerial Shot, Wide-angle drone view, Establishing shot, 45-degree downward tilt
camera_and_perspective.lens_attributes: Wide-angle 24mm equivalent, Rectilinear lens, High clarity, Zero distortion, Deep depth of field
camera_and_perspective.depth_of_field: Deep focus, Hyperfocal distance, Sharpness extending from foreground landscape to distant skyline

lighting_and_atmosphere.time_of_day: Magic Hour, Civil Twilight, Post-sunset (approx 15-20 mins after sunset)
lighting_and_atmosphere.light_quality: Mixed Lighting Scenario: Strong cool ambient skylight balanced with Directional warm artificial LED strips, Dramatic backlighting from sunset horizon
lighting_and_atmosphere.weather_conditions: Dramatic cloudscape with layered Stratus clouds, Clear visibility with low haze, Vibrant sunset afterglow (Alpenglow effect)
lighting_and_atmosphere.shadow_style: Medium ambient occlusion in landscaping, Deep cool blue shadows in unlit areas, No harsh cast shadows from sun

architectural_lighting.interior_illumination: Randomized warm tungsten window spill (3000K), Checkerboard occupancy effect, Visible depth in offices, Not fully lit to maintain realism
architectural_lighting.exterior_facade_effects: Prominent Linear LED facade strips (Golden Amber 4700K), Horizontal architectural emphasis, Soft diffusion along metal louvers, Continuous flowing light lines

landscape_lighting.hardscape_illumination: Warm street lamps and low-level bollard lights casting soft pools of light on asphalt, Illuminated pedestrian pathways outlining the site circulation
landscape_lighting.vegetation_highlighting: Subtle uplighting on key trees, General deep shadow for mass planting, Contrast between dark vegetation and lit pathways
landscape_lighting.water_feature_effects: Reflective surface sheen capturing the sunset gradient and building LED reflections

color_and_grading.palette_theme: Split-Complementary, Sunset Gradients (Violet/Magenta to Peach/Orange sky) vs Warm Gold (4200K) Building Lights
color_and_grading.temperature: Complex balance: Deep Blue/Purple zenith (8000K) blending into Warm Horizon (2500K), contrasted with Warm Tungsten Interior lights (3000K)
color_and_grading.post_processing: Vibrant Saturation, High Dynamic Range (HDR) to retain sky detail and ground lights, Clean digital finish, Minimal noise, Cinematic color grading

rendering_tech_specs.artistic_medium: Photorealistic Commercial Architectural Photography, High-end Real Estate Visualization
rendering_tech_specs.detail_level: 8k resolution, Crisp lighting details, Emissive material glow, No artifacts, Physically based rendering (PBR)

environment_textures.ground_surface: Shadowed asphalt roads, Illuminated pedestrian pathways, Darkened landscape features, Low reflectivity matte surfaces
environment_textures.foliage_style: Lush vegetation in deep shadow, Dark green tones absorbing the twilight, Illuminated only by specific landscape lights
